item.description: How Riot used tech from The Mandalorian to build Worldsâ€™ astonishing mixed reality stage (4 minute read) As the pandemic goes on, events such as the annual League of Legends World Championship have to find creative ways to bring the show to the audience.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
